title: Son of Lassie
creator_credit: S. Sylvan Simon, Samuel Marx and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: Introduced by Bill Collins, “Son of Lassie” is a sequel to “Lassie come home”, based on some characters from the book “Lassie come home” by Eric Knight. It is set during World War II and tells the story of adventure and loyalty between man and dog - Ken (Peter Lawford) and Laddie, son of everyone’s favourite collie, Lassie. A classic family favourite with a cast including Donald Crisp, June Lockhart, Nigel Bruce.
